metadata.description: Incremental...

The default location within which to develop the Resources Group and its child Resources, unless specifically defined otherwise (not all resources - such as SqlServers - are available in all resources).
The default name template to use when developing the names of newly created Resources (eg: 'MYORG-MYAPP-{ENVID}-{BRANCHID}-{RESOURCETYPE}')'.

The http based base url from which to download referenced ARM Templates. In most cases will be an Url to a Storage Account Container Url to which newly downloaded Source Files (just the ARM Templates) are copied to.
The (optional) Single Access Signature (SAS) required to append to ARM Template Uris in order to get them out of a secured Storage Account Container.

The http based base url from which to download referenced ARM Templates. In most cases will be an Url to a Storage Account Container Url to which newly downloaded Source Files (just the ARM Templates) are copied to.
The (optional) Single Access Signature (SAS) required to append to ARM Template Paramter Uris in order to get them out of a secured Storage Account Container.
The Location of the Resource.
Specifies if the vault is enabled for VM or Service Fabric deployment
Specifies if the vault is enabled for ARM template deployment
Specifies if the vault is enabled for volume encryption
Specifies if the vault is enabled for volume encryption

metadata.comments00: So...Templates are a set of sequential parameters, variables, resources, output sections for a reason.

conventions.useVariables: Using the Variables to shape the incoming Parameters, using Functions.
conventions.complexVariables: Variables are grouped as complex objects.
conventions.complexVariablesChildProperties: Note that when later referencing child properties of complex variables, the dot is *outside* the top var name: `variables('top').childProperty`
conventions.lowerCaseUrls: Blob storage urls are case-sensitive: so convention is to keep arm template and parameter filenames lower case.

resource.comment: A collection of variables for use within this template (and any linked child templates).

deployment.comment: A collection of variables for passing to the storageAccount ARM Template for system diagnostics Backup storage.

diagnostics.comment: A collection of variables for passing to the storageAccount ARM Template for system diagnostics Backup storage.

backups.comment: A collection of variables for passing to the storageAccount ARM Template for Backup storage.

media.comment: A collection of variables for passing to the storageAccount ARM Template for Media storage.

media2.comment: A collection of variables for passing to the storageAccount ARM Template for Media storage.

server.comment: A collection of variables for passing to the SqlServer ARM Template -- via the proxy of the sqlServerDatabase ARM that depends on it.

openToAzure.comment: A collection of variables for passing to the SqlServerFirewallRule ARM Template.

database.comment: A collection of variables for passing to the SqlServerDatabase ARM Template.

auditingPolicies.comment: A collection of variables for passing to the SqlServerAuditingPolicies ARM Template.

serverFarm.comment: A collection of variables for passing to the webServer  ARM Template.

resources.comments: Ensures a Resource Group scoped key vault. WARNING. There can be advantages to keeping KeyVaults outside of a Resource Group
resources.name: [variables('keyVault').vault.id]

resources.comments: Ensures a Resource Group scoped unique backup Storage Account (for Db)
resources.name: [variables('storageAccount').deployment.id]

properties.comments: Ensures a Resource Group scoped unique backup Storage Account (for Db)
properties.name: [variables('storageAccount').diagnostics.id]

properties.comments: Ensures a Resource Group scoped unique Database Backups Storage Account
properties.name: [variables('storageAccount').backups.id]

properties.comments: Ensures a Resource Group scoped unique Media Storage Account
properties.name: [variables('storageAccount').media.id]

properties.comments: Ensures a Resource Group scoped unique Media (2) Storage Account
properties.name: [variables('storageAccount').media2.id]

properties.comments: Ensure a Resource Group scoped SqlServer. Is a dependency for the subsequent deployment of the FirewallRule, and the SqlServerDatabase.
properties.name: [variables('sql').server.id]

properties.comments: Ensures a Resource Group scoped Database Firewall Rule. Depends on `SqlServer` database being ensured as deployed first.
properties.name: [variables('sql').server.firewallRule.openToAzure.id]

properties.comments: Ensures a (blank) primary Database is deployed. Note: This should not be necessary (as an app should use DbAsCode/CodeFirst to create it on first run)...but it allows for the setting of collation, and other properties.
properties.name: [variables('sql').server.database.id]

properties.comments: Ensures a Resource Group scoped unique App Service Plan
properties.name: [variables('documentDb').databaseAccount.id]

properties.comments: Ensures a Resource Group scoped unique App Service Plan
properties.name: [variables('web').serverFarm.id]

properties.comments: Ensures a Resource Group scoped web site is deployed
properties.name: [variables('web').site.id]

metadata.description: The ResourceGroup scoped unique 13 character Id.
